collection_holder_name: Claire T. Carney Library, Archives and Special Collections
pageContext.collection_title: "A Voz de Portugal," 1942 audiorecordings, Affonso Ferreira Ferreira-Mendes, Radio Station WSAR, Fall River MA
pageContext.collection_description: Hour-long episodes of "Voz de Portugal" hosted by Affonso Ferreira Ferreira-Mendes
pageContext.collection_notes: The archivist has noted that the "CD" transfers are of poor quality, and she hopes to see these records transferred using better quality equipment.  Also, the family has many more records that they will not turn over to the archive until they listen to them first.  The archivist has been in negotiations with the family for several years, but no further progress has been made.
